summary: In August 1970 600,000 fans flocked to the Isle of Wight to witness the third and final festival to be held on the island. Besides the music, they also got a look at the greed, cynicism and... See full summary Â»
cast: Ian Anderson|Joan Baez|Martin Barre|John Bonham|Clive Bunker|Chick Churchill|Leonard Cohen|Billy Cox|Roger Daltrey|Miles Davis|John Densmore|Donovan|The Doors|Graeme Edge|Emerson Lake and Palmer|Keith Emerson|John Entwistle|Ricki Farr|Andy Fraser|Free|Rory Gallagher|Justin Hayward|Jimi Hendrix|Jethro Tull|Simon Kirke|Paul Kossoff|Robby Krieger|Kris Kristofferson|Greg Lake|Alvin Lee|Ric Lee|John Lodge|Leo Lyons|Ray Manzarek|Richard McCracken|Joni Mitchell|Mitch Mitchell|The Moody Blues|Keith Moon|Jim Morrison|Carl Palmer|Michael Pinder|Paul Rodgers|John Sebastian|Taste|Ray Thomas|Tiny Tim|Pete Townshend|The Who|John Wilson|Zal Yanovsky|Ten Years After
title: Message to Love: The Isle of Wight Festival
